title: Researchers Expose New Intel CPU Flaws Enabling Memory Leaks and Spectre v2 Attacks
description: Researchers at ETH ZÃ¼rich have discovered yet another security flaw that they say impacts all modern Intel CPUs and causes them to leak sensitive data from memory, showing that the vulnerability known as Spectre continues to haunt computer systems after more than seven years.
